description:
What will this course teach?

Picking up chicks can be easy. Among males, the biggest fear is rejection.

This course will teach you the ins and outs of picking up women, seduction, and how to be an alpha male.

What terminology would your target audience expect to use to find your course?

PUA, Pick-up Art: This is simply the art of courting women. Pronounced pee-you-ay.

Bubbling: blowing bubbles back and forth (figuratively) until that small bubble turns into a large bubble that envelops both of you. A playful conversation. Start with a tennis ball and maybe it will turn into a large beach volleyball over time.

IOI, Indicator of Interest: Twirling her hair, opening up her chest, smiling, eye contact, these and other types of body language will show that she interest.

Peacocking: Intentionally displaying and/or isolating yourself so as to stick out. Wearing a leather jacket to a denim party, a shiny tie, showing some chest hair, these are all ways to stick out amongst the noise. Sometimes it pays to be a sore thumb.

What kind of materials are included?

You will receive an hours-long, intensive course on how to smoothly and effectively pick up women.

How long will the course take to complete?

The course should be completed in 3 days or less.

How is the course structured?

14 Lessons, 5 Bonus Lectures 3 Homework Assignments, and 1 PUA Quiz

Why take this course?

Take this course to up your game, whether it be to pick up girls on Tinder, find your soulmate, or approach a woman at Starbucks.
title: How to Pick Up Women: Smooth and Effective Ways to Score Now
